name: Block Buster (RecenityZ)
description:
Move the paddle to hit the ball to bust the blocks to win the game! It couldn't be any simpler!

This is my first ever game and is primarily course-based. I was not focused on graphics during the creation of this game. Go easy on me, why don't ya?

ALSO don't click fullscreen. It will not go well. What I mean by that is your mouse movement won't sync with the screen. Seriously, don't do it.
